colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(RLUNG RTA'I GSO BA'I BSANGS MCHOD GSOL MCHOD RLUNG RTA MI SPAR BA'I RLUNG GA-YAB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MTHO RIGS THOS PA BZANG SPYOD LDAN PA THO YON RAB BRTAN CES BYA BA'I LTAR DGOS ZHES BSAL BSKUL BA'I NGOR ^ DGE SLONG MING TZAM BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN ZHES BYA BA BAG CHAGS BA NAG NAS BRIS PA SEMS CAN DGES SHIS MA SKYES PA LANG BO, ,CHOGS THABS MKHAS KYIS 'GRO DON MDZAD PA'I RLUNG RGYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
